author: Staff Reporter
text:
Ten persons have been arrested in connection with the case of a mob attack on a police station in the Kaliachak area of West Bengal’s Malda district on Sunday.

They were produced before a district court on Tuesday which remanded three of them in police custody. The rest were sent to 14 days’ judicial custody.

“They were arrested on Monday night from the Kaliachak area,” Inspector –General (Law and Order) Anuj Sharma told The Hindu .

Police did not divulge any details about the background of those arrested.
title: Ten held in Malda mob attack case
